c74object.name: abc.hoa.rotate~
c74object.description: abc.hoa.rotate~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) rotate process. This objects enable the rotation of the ambisonic sound field. It can be either a continuous rotation at a certain speed in tours by second (with speed parameter) or a fixed angle of rotation in degrees (with angle parameter, when the speed is zero). The 'returntime' in milliseconds is the duration of the interpolation between a continuous rotation or a fixed angle. Contrary to the encoding that enables the rotation of one punctual source, the abc.hoa.rotate~ objects enable the rotation of the whole sound field.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

method.name: speed
method.description: sets rotation frequency in turn per second [init=0:min=-100:max=100:step=0.001].

method.name: angle
method.description: sets the rotation angle in degree of the soundfield [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the rotation angle in degree

method.name: returntime
method.description: sets the duration time of the return to angle of rotation when the speed rotation comes to 0 [init=20:min=0:max=1000:step=1].
method.digest: sets the duration time to stop the rotation when speed comes to 0 in ms
